tagline: DESI Data Systems Organization Web Pages
body:
### Data ###

These packages form the data pipeline from target selection through final redshifts

* Target Selection
  * [**desitarget**](https://github.com/desihub/desitarget) : target selection based upon
    [Legacy Survey](https://legacysurvey.org) tractor bricks
* Survey Planning and Operations
  * [**fiberassign**](https://github.com/desihub/fiberassign) : fiber assignment; C++
  * [**desisurvey**](https://github.com/desihub/desisurvey) : survey planning and implementation (e.g. next field selector)
  * [**desietc**](https://github.com/desihub/desietc) : online real-time dynamic exposure time calculator
* Spectro Pipeline
  * [**desispec**](https://github.com/desihub/desispec) : spectroscopic data processing algorithms and pipeline
  * [**specex**](https://github.com/desihub/specex) : spectral PSF measurements (not DESI-specific)
  * [**specter**](https://github.com/desihub/specter) : spectroperfectionism extractions (not DESI-specific)
    * also used for pixel-level simulations
  * [**redmonster**](https://bitbucket.org/redmonster/redmonster) : classifications and redshift fitting (not DESI-specific; on bitbucket)

### Core ###

These are utility packages used by others

  * **desiutil** : currently installation and versioning support; eventually will include logging,
    mask bit helper code, etc.
  * **desimodel** : describes the key DESI hardware and survey parameters; mostly data with a little
    I/O helper code
  * **speclite** : spectra utility routines that aren't DESI-specific

### Simulation ###

These packages are for simulating DESI

  * [**desispec**](https://github.com/desihub/desispec) : DESI-specific simulations, including
    * pixsim-desi : wraps specter for pixel-level simulations
    * quickgen: wraps quicksim (soon specsim) to quickly generate pipeline-format output files
    * quickbrick: (coming soon)
    * quickcat: (coming soon)
  * [**specter**](https://github.com/desihub/specter) : pixel-level raw data simulations (not DESI-specific)
    * also used for spectroperfectionism extractions
  * [**specsim**](https://github.com/desihub/specsim) : quick spectrum -> spectrum simulator of throughput, noise,
    and resolution (not DESI-specific)

### Infrastructure ###

  * **desimodules**
  * **desidatamodel**
  * **desitemplate**
  * **desitree**
  * **desiBackup**

### Analysis ###

  * **imaginglss**
  * **LSS**

### External Dependencies ###

  * numpy
  * scipy
  * astropy
  * pyyaml
  * requests
  * fitsio
  * needed for certain features
    * matplotlib / pylab
    * h5py
  * under consideration
    * psycopg2
